languages.text: "Вольный Торговец, напоминаю о договоренностях с Адептус Арбитес. Уверен, ваши дела важны, но содействие Лекс Империалис — не менее серьезная задача".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вокс-связь с треском оживает.{/n} "Вольный Торговец... Сотрудничество с вами было плодотворным, условия проживания — приемлемыми для проведения не одной сотни тренировок. Но все это начинает превращаться в праздный досуг".

languages.text: "Rogue Trader, I must remind you about your agreement with the Adeptus Arbites. As important as your personal affairs doubtless are, upholding the Lex Imperialis is of no lower priority."
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец, напоминаю о договоренностях с Адептус Арбитес. Уверен, ваши дела важны, но содействие Лекс Империалис — не менее серьезная задача".

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader, I must remind you about your agreement with the Adeptus Arbites. As important as your personal affairs doubtless are, aiding the Lex Imperialis is of no lower priority."
"Rogue Trader, I must remind you about your agreement with the Adeptus Arbites. As important as your personal affairs doubtless are, aiding the Lex Imperialis is of no lower priority."
"Rogue Trader, I must remind you about your agreement with the Adeptus Arbites. As important as your personal affairs doubtless are, upholding the Lex Imperialis is of no lower priority."
"Rogue Trader, I must remind you about your agreement with the Adeptus Arbites. As important as your personal affairs doubtless are, upholding the Lex Imperialis is of no lower priority."
"Rogue Trader, I must remind you about your agreement with the Adeptus Arbites. As important as your personal affairs doubtless are, upholding the Lex Imperialis is of no lower priority."
"Rogue Trader, I must remind you about your agreement with the Adeptus Arbites. As important as your personal affairs doubtless are, upholding the Lex Imperialis is of no lower priority."

languages.text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, ich muss Euch an Eure Vereinbarung mit den Adeptus Arbites erinnern. So wichtig Eure persönlichen Angelegenheiten ohne Zweifel sind, die Bewahrung des Lex Imperia hat keine geringere Priorität."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, I must remind you about your agreement with the Adeptus Arbites. As important as your personal affairs doubtless are, upholding the Lex Imperialis is of no lower priority."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, ich muss Euch an Eure Vereinbarung mit den Adeptus Arbites erinnern. So wichtig Eure persönlichen Angelegenheiten ohne Zweifel sind, die Bewahrung des Lex Imperia hat keine geringere Priorität."

languages.text: « Libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}, je me permets de vous rappeler l'accord que vous avez conclu avec l'Adeptus Arbites. Vos affaires personnelles, si importantes soient-elles, ne doivent pas prendre le pas sur l'application de la Lex Imperialis. »
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, I must remind you about your agreement with the Adeptus Arbites. As important as your personal affairs doubtless are, upholding the Lex Imperialis is of no lower priority."

traits.locale_text: « Libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}, je me permets de vous rappeler l'accord que vous avez conclu avec l'Adeptus Arbites. Vos affaires personnelles, si importantes soient-elles, ne doivent pas prendre le pas sur l'application de la Lex Imperialis. »

languages.text: “行商浪人，我必须提醒你，你与帝国法务部之间达成了协议。你的个人事务很重要，这毫无疑问，但维护帝国律法也同样重要。”
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, I must remind you about your agreement with the Adeptus Arbites. As important as your personal affairs doubtless are, upholding the Lex Imperialis is of no lower priority."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人，我必须提醒你，你与帝国法务部之间达成了协议。你的个人事务很重要，这毫无疑问，但维护帝国律法也同样重要。”

languages.text: «Comerciante, debo recordarle su acuerdo con el Adeptus Arbites. Aunque sus asuntos aquí son sin duda importantes, defender la Lex Imperialis no tiene menor prioridad».
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, I must remind you about your agreement with the Adeptus Arbites. As important as your personal affairs doubtless are, upholding the Lex Imperialis is of no lower priority."

traits.locale_text: «Comerciante, debo recordarle su acuerdo con el Adeptus Arbites. Aunque sus asuntos aquí son sin duda importantes, defender la Lex Imperialis no tiene menor prioridad».

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダー、高等裁定局との契約を思い出してください。あなたの個人的な事情がいかに重要であろうとも、レックス・インペリアの遵守はそれに劣らぬ優先事項です」
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, I must remind you about your agreement with the Adeptus Arbites. As important as your personal affairs doubtless are, upholding the Lex Imperialis is of no lower priority."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダー、高等裁定局との契約を思い出してください。あなたの個人的な事情がいかに重要であろうとも、レックス・インペリアの遵守はそれに劣らぬ優先事項です」

languages.text: "Hür Tacir, Adeptus Arbites ile akdettiğiniz anlaşmayı hatırlatmak isterim. Şahsi işleriniz ne kadar mühim olsa da Lex İmperialis'in gereksinimlerini yerine getirmek de bir o kadar önemlidir."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, I must remind you about your agreement with the Adeptus Arbites. As important as your personal affairs doubtless are, upholding the Lex Imperialis is of no lower priority."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir, Adeptus Arbites ile akdettiğiniz anlaşmayı hatırlatmak isterim. Şahsi işleriniz ne kadar mühim olsa da Lex İmperialis'in gereksinimlerini yerine getirmek de bir o kadar önemlidir."
